name: Pink Goes to Hollywood
overview: Pink Panther, MGM's too cool cat, hits Hollywood to audition for his next big movie role. But Pink's big break may be foiled by inspector Clouseau! Pink wreaks havoc on acres of pantherized movie sets, like Polterpink, Pinkenstein and Jungle Pink. With props like stoplights, giant fly swatters and a bowling ball, Pink's bag of tricks is never empty! In the nick of time, Pink escapes through "safe" rooms and bonus rounds!
